Sea temperature: Sea temperature anomalies with respect to the average value in the period 2010-2019. Assess the sensitivity to an increase in temperature.
Heat waves/global heat anomalies: Discrete anomalously warm events at sea water that last for a prolonged period of time in the period 2010-2019.
Sea water salinity (PSU): Salinity anomalies computed with respect to the average value in the period 2010-2019. Assess the sensitivity to a change (increse or decrease) in salinity.
Acidification (pH): Ocean pH. Assess the sensitivity to an increase in ocean acidification.
Oxygen content in water: Decrease in oxygen concentration with respect to the average value in the period 2010-2019.
Sea level rise (SSH): Satellite observed sea level rise referenced to the 1993-2012 period covering the 2010-2019 years.
Changes in ice cover: Sea ice area fraction or sea ice thickness over the period 2010-2019.
Wind exposure changes (wind speed at 10: Wind-induced turbulent mixing determined as the cube of the horizontal speed of the wind at a height of 10 m above the surface over the period 2010-2019.
Changes in water currents: Changes in current speed or current components over the period 2010-2019.

STRESSORS: Offshore cicalittoral rocks and biogenic reefs
Offshore circalittoral sand and muddy sand
Abyssal seabed, mud and mixed sediment
Commercially exploited pelagic fish and shellfish
Commercially exploited demersal fish and shellfish
Wintering seabirds: BirdLife international Important Bird Areas (IBA)
